players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I find it strange that Alice was found dead so suddenly. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we can trust everyone in this town."
You: "I'm concerned about the sudden turn of events and suggest we all share any suspicious occurrences or observations we may have had since last night."
